title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: template FTRPack GitHub repository, R package, pkgdown website. NMFS palette, appropriate license disclaimer, NMFS footer logo. GitHub Actions automatically rebuild site whenever files changed. instructions use usethis pkgdown packages. install . pkgdown uses Readme.md pull Disclaimer footer FIT, migh change future, need Rmd file. update Readme.Rmd file, need remember knit file update Readme.md. make GitHub Action .

title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EV_exports
text: Read directory .csv files (can several variables) exported Echoview.   function preserves cells depth. Uses packages readxl, readr, purrr, dplyr.

title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EV_exports
read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EV_exports
text: var - variables read (subdirectories need named variables) SurveyName - name survey DirNameFile excel file - contains paths locations files database optional argument format .csv files .  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0 exportloc optional argument using Export_Dir Region_Export_dir column entry DirNameFile spreadsheet.  1 Export_Dir, 0 Region_Export_dir

repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
text: Function take directory EV files reset path. works EV files just EK80 fileset, EK60 file set first fileset, EK80 second fileset. May want eventually convert calling "fileset1" "fileset2" instead EK60 EK80. Written RT 2022. Requires excel file input hat says paths row survey (survey_name), column path file name

title: repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
text: SurveyName name survey excel file DirNameFile excel file name paths ni optional argument file start (default ni=1 first file). Excel file following columns (header names) Cal_File: calibration file name Base_Path: Orig_EV_Dir: Raw_Dir EK80_Cal_File EK80_Raw_Dir

title: repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
code: if (FALSE) { DirNameFile="C:/rthomas/R/Rcode/EK60_EK80 conversion/EK60_Ek80_conv_updated/Directory Structure EK60 EK80 conversion updated.xlsx" SurveyName='2019_US' repath_EVdir(SurveyName,DirNameFile) }
